decisionId.description: the ID of the decision in the DMN

decisionName.description: the name of the decision in the DMN

version.description: the version of the deployed decision

decisionKey.description: the key of the deployed decision

decisionRequirementsId.description: the ID of the DRG in the DMN this decision belongs to

decisionRequirementsKey.description: the key of the deployed DRG this decision belongs to

duplicate.description:
{@code true} if the decision is a duplicate (and has been deployed previously),
    otherwise {@code false}
